Question & Options:
Which individuals were involved in the production of the film related to the Urdu language and specific shooting locations?
Options:
A. fernandez
B. khan
C. glasgow
D. All of the above

What were the challenges faced by Fernandez and Khan during the production of their film?
Options:
A. Fernandez learned Urdu for the film.
B. Khan faced visa issues for filming in the United Kingdom.
C. Fernandez had a coach to help with language.
D. The film was successfully shot in the United Kingdom.
Correct Answer: Fernandez learned Urdu for the film. Khan faced visa issues for filming in the United Kingdom. Fernandez had a coach to help with language.
